about_the_game:
Free version of this prologue.
Mainly two groups of echo lands have been opened, namely "Snowy Land" and "Crystal Mine".
There are 18 Echo cards in total that can be collected.
The highest echo depth (difficulty) that adventurers can unlock and challenge is level III.
The highest equipment level is open to 5 levels (common-white, excellent-green, rare-blue, epic-gold, legendary-orange).
The maximum character level cap is 25.
You can obtain up to two summoning relics.
An action independent game similar to Metroidvania and treasure hunting, it is a derivative work of Death Cells RogueLite that uses pixel rendering technology. Compared with other similar works



Create the ultimate 2D pixel-based battle experience in the name of ACT!



This world provides a variety of combinations of weapons and skills, each of which can bring different strategies and combat experiences.
At the same time, it also combines the characteristics of horizontal action games to create secrets for this world.



This world provides a wide variety of equipment affixes, which can be assembled into various attribute tactics.
Use such a mechanism to pay tribute to the pursuit of the sword and magic era.



This world has both hierarchy and repeated deaths. The way of progress requires you and me to pursue.
Paying tribute is also progressing.



Explore and challenge this world with a tarot-style collection to fill your loot!

short_description: "7th Domain" is a horizontal version action game derived from Roguelike Metroidvania combined with treasure grinding gameplay. You will play a child of destiny who repairs the world and finds the truth of the broken world. You will grow in battle and challenge the unknown and hidden forces.
